title: "New AI tool calculates materials' stress and strain based on photos"
excerpt: "MIT researchers have developed a technique to quickly determine certain properties of a material, like stress and strain, based on an image of the material showing its internal structure. The approach could one day eliminate the need for arduous physics-based calculations,"
